channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: SEC and Binance.US to negotiate deal avoiding total asset freeze
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: U.S. District Judge Amy Berman Jackson has ordered the two entities to work towards a compromise.

item.title: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao denies rumors of selling Bitcoin to bolster BNB
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: While several theories emerged, the Binance CEO asserted that no BTC or BNB trading activity is happening behind the scenes.

item.title: SEC asks for more time to respond to Coinbase call for crypto clarity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The securities regulator said it would make a recommendation within 120 days on Coinbase’s rulemaking request, but says the action has “no merit.”

item.title: Cybernetic organizations — BORGs — are doomed to fail
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Bernhard Blaha
item.description: Cybernetic organizations automate decision-making so that DAO actions can be taken without proposals — implementing law through code.

item.title: North Korean hackers swipe over $100M from Atomic Wallet users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to Elliptic, a blockchain analysis company, an estimated 5,500 crypto wallets have been affected by the attack.

item.title: Hinman documents suggest SEC is the wrong agency to govern digital assets, crypto lawyer says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: John Deaton, a crypto lawyer and founder of CryptoLaw, told Cointelegraph that released Hinman documents highlight the need for Congress to intervene and provide clarity in governing digital assets.

item.title: SEC hears from Blockchain Assoc., House Republicans on ‘exchange’ definition proposal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: More opposition has come in at the last minute to the year-old proposal reimagining the SEC’s definition of a securities exchange.

item.title: Footwear conglomerate Puma launches 3D Web3 experience
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The experience is designed for everyone, but Puma Pass holders gain access to exclusive perks.

item.title: SBF seeks to sever new charges from trial, says proceedings may take ‘years’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The U.S. cannot try Sam Bankman-Fried for the charges until a lengthy appeals process in the Bahamas has been exhausted, defense attorneys stated.

item.title: US lawmaker invokes SEC lawsuits in considering crypto regulatory framework
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Rep. Maxine Waters, granting crypto firms provisional registration under a proposed framework “could reward bad actors with a ‘get out of jail free’ card.”

item.title: Why Bitcoin’s resistance to retesting the $25K support could be futile
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin’s price continues to explore the lower regions of its trading range, but a drop to $25,000 seems nearly inevitable, according to derivatives data.

item.title: Irish data watchdog blocks Google from launching Bard in the EU: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Google’s been forced to postpone the launch of its Bard AI service in the EU after Irish regulators accused it of failing to file the proper paperwork.

item.title: Crypto yield platform Haru suspends transfers after investigation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The firm previously stated it had an issue with one of its service partners.

item.title: SEC and Binance seek compromise on US assets freeze
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Binance.US would have to transfer all U.S.-based assets to new wallets but would be allowed to pay its bills under a proposed consent order.

item.title: Bitstamp now included on FCA’s list of registered crypto firms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Financial Conduct Authority listed 42 registered crypto firms in compliance with the U.K. government’s Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism rules.

item.title: SEC lawsuit sheds light on Coinbase’s management
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: In a recent interview with Cointelegraph, venture capitalist Kevin O’Leary criticized Coinbase’s strategy to address the current regulatory environment.

item.title: History of computing: From Abacus to quantum computers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Journey through time and witness the remarkable advancements that have shaped the computing world we know today.

item.title: Bitcoin price rejects CPI boost as market Fed rate pause odds near 95%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin falls back in line almost immediately after closing the weekend’s CME futures gap near $26,500.

item.title: Unfazed by SEC tumult, top banks work to make blockchains interoperable
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Singer
item.description: Swift, the interbank payments network, has enlisted a dozen world-class institutions — and Chainlink — to fix blockchain’s interoperability deficit.

item.title: Hinman docs unsealed: SEC concerned over ‘Ether is not a security’ statement
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Blanche Gatt
item.description: Hinman risked contradicting himself over the statement Ether isn’t a security, unsealed SEC internal discussion documents show.

item.title: Peter McCormack’s Real Bedford Football Club puts Bitcoin on the map
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: Real Bedford is moving up in the leagues and gaining followers worldwide through owner Peter McCormack’s love of Bitcoin.

item.title: Apple to delist Nostr-based Damus app over Bitcoin tip feature
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The decentralized social media app called it a watershed moment for peer-to-peer transactions and claimed it would affect many other platforms with similar features.

item.title: Uniswap releases version 4 code, allowing for new types of liquidity pools
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new version features “hooks” that will allow for more customized options, but it will not be implemented until more feedback is obtained from the community.

item.title: Bitcoin gets closer to '51% attack' on altcoin market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Bitcoin's market dominance index has failed to sustain above 50% since April 2021 — so will this time be any different?

item.title: Hong Kong and US aim for stablecoin regulations by 2024
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The U.S. is currently working on stablecoin market regulations, introducing three drafts of the bill by the first week of June.

item.title: DeFi protocol Sturdy Finance offers $100K bounty to hacker if funds are returned
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Sturdy Finance co-founder Sam Forman said the company will not pursue the issue any further if the hacker accepts the offer and returns the remaining funds.

item.title: Board member Yat Siu answers community concerns on ApeCoin DAO salary payouts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: One community member described the salaries as “insanely out of touch,” while another Twitter user accused those who established the rates of being “disconnected from reality.“

item.title: Ugandan Bitcoiner dreams of the secular economy: BTC Prague 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The Bitcoin community helped Uganda’s Brindon Mwiine travel to BTC Prague after winning tickets for his adoption efforts in East Africa.

item.title: Developer Uncle Rockstar shares the key to Bitcoin adoption: BTC Prague 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Rockstar believes that as more quality Bitcoiners join, support, communicate and collaborate, Bitcoin will continue to rise.

item.title: How Peter McCormack is turning an unknown town into a Bitcoin hub
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Bitcoin pitch invasion! A new Cointelegraph video examines a local soccer club’s impact on its town and national Bitcoin adoption.
